class.name: ClassDB
class.description: Provides access to metadata stored for every available engine class. [b]Note:[/b] Script-defined classes with [code]class_name[/code] are not part of [ClassDB], so they will not return reflection data such as a method or property list. However, [GDExtension]-defined classes [i]are[/i] part of [ClassDB], so they will return reflection data.

method.name: can_instantiate
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if objects can be instantiated from the specified [param class], otherwise returns [code]false[/code].

method.name: class_call_static
method.description: Calls a static method on a class.

method.name: class_exists
method.description: Returns whether the specified [param class] is available or not.

method.name: class_get_api_type
method.description: Returns the API type of the specified [param class].

method.name: class_get_enum_constants
method.description: Returns an array with all the keys in [param enum] of [param class] or its ancestry.

method.name: class_get_enum_list
method.description: Returns an array with all the enums of [param class] or its ancestry.

method.name: class_get_integer_constant
method.description: Returns the value of the integer constant [param name] of [param class] or its ancestry. Always returns 0 when the constant could not be found.

method.name: class_get_integer_constant_enum
method.description: Returns which enum the integer constant [param name] of [param class] or its ancestry belongs to.

method.name: class_get_integer_constant_list
method.description: Returns an array with the names all the integer constants of [param class] or its ancestry.

method.name: class_get_method_argument_count
method.description: Returns the number of arguments of the method [param method] of [param class] or its ancestry if [param no_inheritance] is [code]false[/code].

method.name: class_get_method_list
method.description: Returns an array with all the methods of [param class] or its ancestry if [param no_inheritance] is [code]false[/code]. Every element of the array is a [Dictionary] with the following keys: [code]args[/code], [code]default_args[/code], [code]flags[/code], [code]id[/code], [code]name[/code], [code]return: (class_name, hint, hint_string, name, type, usage)[/code]. [b]Note:[/b] In exported release builds the debug info is not available, so the returned dictionaries will contain only method names.

method.name: class_get_property
method.description: Returns the value of [param property] of [param object] or its ancestry.

method.name: class_get_property_default_value
method.description: Returns the default value of [param property] of [param class] or its ancestor classes.

method.name: class_get_property_getter
method.description: Returns the getter method name of [param property] of [param class].

method.name: class_get_property_list
method.description: Returns an array with all the properties of [param class] or its ancestry if [param no_inheritance] is [code]false[/code].

method.name: class_get_property_setter
method.description: Returns the setter method name of [param property] of [param class].

method.name: class_get_signal
method.description: Returns the [param signal] data of [param class] or its ancestry. The returned value is a [Dictionary] with the following keys: [code]args[/code], [code]default_args[/code], [code]flags[/code], [code]id[/code], [code]name[/code], [code]return: (class_name, hint, hint_string, name, type, usage)[/code].

method.name: class_get_signal_list
method.description: Returns an array with all the signals of [param class] or its ancestry if [param no_inheritance] is [code]false[/code]. Every element of the array is a [Dictionary] as described in [method class_get_signal].

method.name: class_has_enum
method.description: Returns whether [param class] or its ancestry has an enum called [param name] or not.

method.name: class_has_integer_constant
method.description: Returns whether [param class] or its ancestry has an integer constant called [param name] or not.

method.name: class_has_method
method.description: Returns whether [param class] (or its ancestry if [param no_inheritance] is [code]false[/code]) has a method called [param method] or not.

method.name: class_has_signal
method.description: Returns whether [param class] or its ancestry has a signal called [param signal] or not.

method.name: class_set_property
method.description: Sets [param property] value of [param object] to [param value].

method.name: get_class_list
method.description: Returns the names of all engine classes available. [b]Note:[/b] Script-defined classes with [code]class_name[/code] are not included in this list. Use [method ProjectSettings.get_global_class_list] to get a list of script-defined classes instead.

method.name: get_inheriters_from_class
method.description: Returns the names of all engine classes that directly or indirectly inherit from [param class].

method.name: get_parent_class
method.description: Returns the parent class of [param class].

method.name: instantiate
method.description: Creates an instance of [param class].

method.name: is_class_enabled
method.description: Returns whether this [param class] is enabled or not.

method.name: is_class_enum_bitfield
method.description: Returns whether [param class] (or its ancestor classes if [param no_inheritance] is [code]false[/code]) has an enum called [param enum] that is a bitfield.

method.name: is_parent_class
method.description: Returns whether [param inherits] is an ancestor of [param class] or not.
